
Corgis: https://corgis-edu.github.io/corgis/csv/video_games/
	(video_gamess.csv)
	
Economics: https://researchportal.port.ac.uk/portal/en/datasets/video-games-dataset(d4fe28cd-1e44-4d2f-9db6-85b347bf761e).html
	(Managerial_and_Decision_Economics_2013_Video_Games_Dataset.csv)
	
Kaggle: https://www.kaggle.com/skateddu/metacritic-critic-games-reviews-20112019
	(metacritic_reviews.csv)
